item.description:
Hello Runners!

Hope your enjoying the summer (or lack of summer as it feels this week)!!! Just wanted to put out a promo for the 1st annual MS 5K Bur Run + Music Festival on Sunday September 12th @ 11:30AM @ The Burren in Davis Square! The Burren is finally hosting their on run and at what better time than our 2nd anniversary of the Monday Nite Bur Run! That's right, it will be two years that The Burren has hosted our Monday Nite runs! So let's show our support by signing up to run, walk, or volunteer! If you are not around or unavailable, please consider down loading a race app and sending an in kind donation to support MS! It's the least we can do support our good friends @ The Burren and all they do for the running community!!!

You can go to www.burren.com to down load race app on link to on-line registration, or follow this link to runreg.com to sign up directly! http://www.runreg.com... To volunteer please email Gordon at bur-run@hotmail.com

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: MS 5K Bur Run + Music Festival
